org.apache.giraph.comm.netty

类 NettyServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.comm.netty.NettyServer

  • public class NettyServer
extends Object
    This server uses Netty and will implement all Giraph communication

    • 字段概要

      Used to authenticate with netty clients
